name: osteopathy
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the treatment of injuries to bones and muscles using pressure and movement: There is evidence that osteopathy can help to ease spinal pain. Some patients choose to try alternative therapies such as osteopathy and acupuncture.
More examplesFewer examplesOsteopathy and other manipulative treatments can help, but always check the qualifications of your therapist.Osteopathy is concerned with maintaining correct relationships between bones, muscles, and connective tissues.I have regular osteopathy and swim twice a day.
